name: Candev.ScoringPage
description: Creates a scoring form that can be used by judges.
author: StatCan Digital Innovation

DisabledHtml.Html: The Scoring form is currently disabled.

Template.Text:
{% assign user = User | user_id | users_by_id %}
{% assign userId = User | user_id %}

<v-container fluid>
  <v-card-text>
    <v-row justify="center">
        <v-col cols="8">       
          <v-radio-group name="score" v-model="score" row>
                <v-radio v-for="n in 11" :key="n" :label="`${n - 1}`" :value="`${n - 1}`" />
		  </v-radio-group>        
        </v-col>
        <v-col cols="8">
         	  <v-textarea name="comment" v-model="comment" filled="filled" label="{{ "commentLabel" | localize }}" rows="5"/>
        </v-col>
        <v-col cols="8">
          <v-alert type="success" v-if="form.successMessage">
            {% raw %}{{ form.successMessage }}{% endraw %}
          </v-alert>
          <v-alert type="error" v-if="form.serverValidationMessage">
            {% raw %}{{ form.serverValidationMessage[0] }}{% endraw %}
          </v-alert>
        </v-col>
        <v-col cols="8">
    	  <v-btn type="submit" depressed block @click="formHandleSubmit" :disabled="form.submitting">{{ "submitLabel" | localize }}</v-btn>
        </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-card-text>
  </v-container>
